name: Kubernetes
description:
I have been using it in production and for dynamic environments for over 7 years. 
I understand the concept, what problems and how it solves, what components it consists of and when to apply specific components/approaches. 
I know how to debug problems and interact with APIs, both from console and from Golang.

name: GCP
description:
I have been using it in production and for dynamic environments for over 7 years. 
I understand the concept, what problems and how it solves, what components it consists of and when to apply specific components/approaches. 
I know how to debug problems and interact with APIs, both from console and from Golang.

name: Linux
description:
I have been using different linux distributions for over 15 years. 
During this time I have used: Debian, OpenSUSE, SLES, Slackware, Kali, Ubuntu, Gentoo, Puppy and others. 
I have a good understanding of the components, how they work and how to interact with them. 
I am familiar with debugging tools and approaches to identify and fix problems.

name: Ansible
description:
I have been using it in production and for dynamic environments for over 7 years. 
More than once implemented large configurations from scratch. 
Created dozens of roles for configuring servers, routers, devices, services, clouds. 
I know how to interact with all components of the system. 
This includes: vault, dynamic inventory, Tower, custom configuration, over bastion, custom facts... 
I can describe a configuration of any complexity.
